titleStmt.title: Commune Concilium tentum in camera Guihald civitatis London, die Jovis, decimo septimo die Septembris, anno domini millesimo sexcentesimo septuagesio quarto ... an act for the settlement and well ordering of the several publick markets within the city of London.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Coats of arms on p. [1] and at head of title.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
